annotations: DATE:15TH MAY 2024 REF: IBC/PK/001 == HAVE FOLL TO FIX: ACCT RINL: 75,000 MT (GOONYELLA/ GOONYELLA C) 10% MOLOO.COAL IN BULK ON FOB (TRIMMED) BASIS(BRAND: ‘GOONYELLA / GOONYELLA C’ COKING COAL; SELLER: M/S BHP). LOADPORT :DTA, NEWPORT NEWS OR NS PIER 6, NORFOLK, USA AT CHARTERER (RINL)’S OPTION. LOAD RATE: FOR ‘HPCT’ & ‘APCT’: FOR ‘DBCT’:​ VESSEL SIZE DWT IN MT) LOAD RATE (MT/WWD 65,001 – 69,999 30,000 70,000 – 79,999 40,000 80,000 & above 45,000 DISCHARGEPORT: GANGAVARAM PORT (GPL) OR VISAKHAPATNAM PORT (VPT), AT CHARTERER (RINL)’S OPTION. DISCHARGE RATE: 40,000 MT FOR GPL (23,000 MT FOR VPT) PWWD OF 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS. LAYCAN: 10-19 JUNE’24. 2.50% ADCOM + 1.25% TO INTERBULK REPLY BY 1230 HOURS IST THURSDAYI.E 16TH MAY 2024
